name: openchatagent
description: 开源智能客服系统 - AI优先+人工接管

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=chat-ui && npm install --workspace=chat-core && npm install --workspace=ai-service && npm install --workspace=chat-session && npm install --workspace=chat-admin && npm install --workspace=chat-admin-ui
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "ui,core,ai,session,admin-api,admin-ui" -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta,blue,red" "npm run dev:ui" "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:ai" "npm run dev:session" "npm run dev:admin-api" "npm run dev:admin-ui"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "core,ai,session,admin" -c "green,yellow,magenta,blue" "npm run start:core" "npm run start:ai" "npm run start:session" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:core && npm run build:ai && npm run build:session && npm run build:admin
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:ai && npm run test:session && npm run test:admin
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules chat-ui/node_modules chat-core/node_modules ai-service/node_modules chat-session/node_modules chat-admin/node_modules chat-admin-ui/node_modules

author: OpenChatAgent Contributors
